title: Some worms recently evolved the ability to regrow a complete head

title_detail.value: Some worms recently evolved the ability to regrow a complete head

summary: New study reveals regeneration of amputated body parts is not always an ancient trait and scientists might need to rethink the way they compare animals with regenerative abilities.

summary_detail.value: New study reveals regeneration of amputated body parts is not always an ancient trait and scientists might need to rethink the way they compare animals with regenerative abilities.
